snippet: The vast majority of professional tennis players remember exactly when they received theirs. “It’s like a milestone,” Roger Federer said.
abstract: Tennis players, including Roger Federer, recall first time they received their first ATP ranking point, reward for winning first round in event on Futures circuit, lowest level of professional tennis.
lead_paragraph: The vast majority of professional tennis players remember exactly when they received theirs. “It’s like a milestone,” Roger Federer said.

headline.main: One Small Rankings Point Feels Like a Giant Leap, When It Is the First
headline.print_headline: One Small Rankings Point Feels Like a Giant Leap, When It Is the First
